key.name: use-fahrenheit
key.description: Switch between Celsius and Fahrenheit for temperature display.

key.name: use-12hour-format
key.description: Display time in 12-hour format with AM/PM.

key.name: update-interval
key.description: How often to refresh weather data, in minutes.

key.name: show-humidity
key.description: Display relative humidity in weather details.

key.name: location
key.description: Latitude and longitude (comma separated) when in manual mode.

key.name: location-name
key.description: Display name of the manually set location.

key.name: panel-position
key.description: Where to place the weather widget on the GNOME panel: 'left', 'center', or 'right'.

key.name: panel-position-index
key.description: An integer index representing the panel position: 0 = Left, 1 = Center, 2 = Right.

key.name: show-text-in-panel
key.description: Display the temperature as text next to the icon in the panel.

key.name: show-location-label
key.description: Display location mode indicator with GPS icon in the panel.

key.name: panel-icon-size
key.description: Size of the weather icon in the GNOME panel in pixels.

key.name: panel-text-size
key.description: Size of the temperature text in the GNOME panel in pixels.
